title: Syncopated Automata
description: Syncopated Automata [Working Title] is an Augmented Reality electronic music album built for Meta Quest 3. It features several synth based compositions accompanied by interactive AR visuals that adapt to your environment. Built with the latest Unity DOTS/ECS tech and ambisonic 3D audio this is the bleeding edge of standalone AR.

title: Containment Unit
description: Introducing the BZOR:T2000 Desktop Artificial Life Containment Unit™ Military grade, use with caution. For dedicated caretakers only.

label: ./03a
title: Puppetz
description: Puppetz is a collab with the mega talented James Hutchinson, bringing his character designs to life through an AR experience we wish Jim Henson could have tried.

title: Toybox
description: Toybox is a collab with PJ Richardson and the awesome talent at Laundry Studio. With PJ's amazing eye for design we're bringing an overload of joy to the Vision Pro.

title: Little Wonder
description: After a successful prototype and proof of concept completed for the Magic Leap we are updating the concept for Apple Vision Pro.
platform: AR. Magic Leap → Apple Vision Pro

title: Saṅkhāra
description: In a wonderfully fulfilling collaboration with old friend James Paterson (Presstube) we created a portrait of symbolic consiousness in three movements. The pixels of a cellular automata swarm around and rearrange to form various 3D mental formations.

title: Cyclorbs
description: Cyclorbs are 3D interactive sculptures emerging from hypnotic interwoven osillations based on phyllotaxis (the same mathematics governing the seed packing in a sunflower).
